columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the log group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the log group.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time of the log group.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data.

columns.name: retention_in_days
columns.description: The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1827, and 3653.

columns.name: data_protection
columns.description: Log group data protection policy information.

columns.name: data_protection_policy
columns.description: The data protection policy document for a log group.
